name: TOWNSHIP OF KENNEDY, a municipal corporation, v. OHIO VALLEY GENERAL HOSPITAL, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Township of Kennedy v. Ohio Valley General Hospital

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
parties: TOWNSHIP OF KENNEDY, a municipal corporation, v. OHIO VALLEY GENERAL HOSPITAL, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
The Order of the Court of Common Pleas of Allegheny County is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Arthur H. Stroyd, Jr., Reed, Smith, Shaw & McClay, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Joseph J. Pass, Jr., Jubelirer, Pass & Intrieri, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
435 A.2d 177
TOWNSHIP OF KENNEDY, a municipal corporation, v. OHIO VALLEY GENERAL HOSPITAL, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 14, 1981.
Decided Oct. 8, 1981.
Arthur H. Stroyd, Jr., Reed, Smith, Shaw & McClay, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Joseph J. Pass, Jr., Jubelirer, Pass & Intrieri, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
